channel.title: 647 Alaric
channel.description:
Hello everyone, so this is a 647 revision base that was written by Peril. It is very bare with nothing besides login, lobby, etc. (I'll get into the list below)... From Perils thread:
There is bugs with route finding, region loading, send items, and multiplayer. Fix those at your own will. -Don't forget to put the cache into the cache folder. (rse/data/cache/) -If you dump region data from a region that has not loaded XTEA keys the clipping data will not work! To dump clipping data use the client from one of the downloads above and use the command while ingame "dumpregion". A dat file will be added to the clipping folder of the client, so take it and put it into rse/data/regions. Also, the client provided above will not crash from the lack of xtea keys. The Route finder is straight from the client so don't bash on me for it. A side note, some objects such as Bank booths do not clip. Don't ask me why, ask Jagex..
So this has: -Packet handling -Walking -Running -Talking -Route finding -Event system -Update server -Animation & Graphics Mask -Send items packet -Send skills -Pnpc -Appearance Rendering finished -Male & Female appearance -Object Handler, did almost all object examines in Edgeville region -More... All I did was add some interfaces, adding players to friends list, fixed send items, saving/loading, dumped some regions and xteas. Downloads: [url=https://mega.nz/#!eUcCVDab!fDxjovaP21PrSaT0AW_ybzFdXuz2gWYllcS3Turbg5o]Server[/url] [url=https://mega.nz/#!CZ1BjAyB!n_C3aJVI3bNmPnC4yEM3Wvc26Lj_uVyYVI9zJ9be5Hs]Cache[/url] [url=https://mega.nz/#!SZUEUaxT!F16kQHE_Vf4jwhUqiz0FJ8jOqb2CF1TTIrcnqfBf6Z8]Client[/url] Note: Client is highly debugged with incoming/outgoing packets in console, xtea #'s, region stuff, etc. I did that so I could figure out more about the client and server... Pictures: [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/rk0k6c.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/sg72fl.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2hh1zx4.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/16h5hxv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1ffgra.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2m5krav.png[/img] Credits: Emily: Identifying packets, masks, ect, ect Peril: Original base/source Dementhium Team: Item definition editor & dump Lumby: Skillcape handler, emote system is my own Graham: Cache related files Flamable: Cache related files

item.title: 647 Alaric
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Titanium_:

So you mean re-releasing what Emily already released? What’s been changed with your version compared to hers?

Pretty much.

Well I figured since Emily’s topic is 3 or so years old, I’d bring the 647 revision back. Should I not re-release a 3 year old topic?

On the current version I have, I’ve got npcs to work and a basic skill action going. The skill action is on this version but not npcs.

Read full topic

item.title: 647 Alaric
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Hello everyone, so this is a 647 revision base that was written by Peril. It is very bare with nothing besides login, lobby, etc. (I’ll get into the list below)…

From Perils thread:

There is bugs with route finding, region loading, send items, and multiplayer. Fix those at your own will.
-Don’t forget to put the cache into the cache folder. (rse/data/cache/)
-If you dump region data from a region that has not loaded XTEA keys the clipping data will not work!

To dump clipping data use the client from one of the downloads above and use the command while ingame “dumpregion”. A dat file will be added to the clipping folder of the client, so take it and put it into rse/data/regions. Also, the client provided above will not crash from the lack of xtea keys.

The Route finder is straight from the client so don’t bash on me for it. A side note, some objects such as Bank booths do not clip. Don’t ask me why, ask Jagex…

So this has:
-Packet handling
-Walking
-Running
-Talking
-Route finding
-Event system
-Update server
-Animation & Graphics Mask
-Send items packet
-Send skills
-Pnpc
-Appearance Rendering finished
-Male & Female appearance
-Object Handler, did almost all object examines in Edgeville region
-More…

All I did was add some interfaces, adding players to friends list, fixed send items, saving/loading, dumped some regions and xteas.

Downloads:
Server
Cache
Client Note: Client is highly debugged with incoming/outgoing packets in console, xtea #'s, region stuff, etc. I did that so I could figure out more about the client and server…

Lumby: Skillcape handler, emote system is my own
Graham: Cache related files
Flamable: Cache related files
